charges.charge_disposition: 57 months in custody; 3 years of Supervised Release. $7000 fine (interest waived) payable at the rate of $25 per quarter while in custody and 10% of gross income per month while on supervised release. $100 Special Assessment. Special conditions of Supervised Release: 1. May not possess firearm, ammunition, destructive device; 2. Full financial disclosure; 3. Employment prohibition; 4. Maintain lawful, verifiable, full-time employment; if not employed, perform 20 hours community service per week; 5. Search condition. Recommendation to Bureau of Prisons: Designation to FCI Otisville.
